mapper.select: select a.album_no as "no", a.name, a.release_date as "releaseDate", a.img, a.country, a.genre_no as "genre.no", g.name as "genre.name", s.singer_no as "singer.no", i.name as "singer.name" from album a, album_singer s, genre g, singer i where a.album_no = s.album_no and a.genre_no = g.genre_no and s.singer_no = i.singer_no order by a.album_no asc
